QuotLineItmUsageRsrcPlcy.name: QuotLineItmUsageRsrcPlcy
QuotLineItmUsageRsrcPlcy.description: Represents the policies that are used for the usage resource that's associated with the usage product added in the quote line item.

DrawdownOrder.description: Specifies the order that's used to debit consumption of entitlements related to the usage resource from the usage entitlement bucket.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The auto-generated identifier for the quote line item usage resource policy record. For example, QLIURP-00004 or QLIURP-4567.

ProductUsageResourcePolicyId.description: The product usage resource policy associated with the quote line item.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The quote line item associated with the usage product.

RatingFrequencyPolicyId.description: The rating frequency policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the quote line item.

UsageAggregationPolicyId.description: The usage aggregation policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the quote line item.

UsageCommitmentPolicyId.description: The usage commitment policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the quote line item.

UsageOveragePolicyId.description: The usage overage policy associated with the quote line item.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the usage product that's added in the quote line item.
